sentences.en: "What am I doing wrong, anyway?" — "Beats me, Lewis."
sentences.cn: “不管怎样，我到底做错了什么？”——“这我也不知道，刘易斯。”

sentences.en: Dave’s got something wrong with his foot.
sentences.cn: 戴夫的一只脚出了点毛病。

sentences.en: Don't get me wrong, it's interesting work. But it's not permanent.
sentences.cn: 别误会我的意思，这个工作很有意思，可惜不是长期性的。

sentences.en: Don’t worry, there’s nothing wrong .
sentences.cn: 别担心，没问题的。

sentences.en: I asked him to sort those files, but he’s done it all wrong (= in completely the wrong way ) .
sentences.cn: 我让他整理这些文件，可是他弄得根本不对。

sentences.en: I calculate he is wrong in saying that.
sentences.cn: 我认为他说的那句话是错误的。

sentences.en: I must have added it up wrong, then.
sentences.cn: 那我一定是加错了。

sentences.en: I think I got question 3 wrong .
sentences.cn: 我想第三题我做错了。

sentences.en: I wish you’d stop trying to prove me wrong (= show that I am wrong ) all the time.
sentences.cn: 我希望你不要总是想证明我错了。

sentences.en: I wouldn't like to get on the wrong side of him.
sentences.cn: 我不想激怒他。

sentences.en: If you remember these three golden rules you won't go far wrong.
sentences.cn: 记住这三条金律，就不会错到哪儿。

sentences.en: If you think I'm happy with what's left, you're very wrong.
sentences.cn: 如果你认为我对剩下的很满意，那你就大错特错了。

sentences.en: Instead of complaining about what's wrong, be grateful for what's right.
sentences.cn: 别抱怨不好的事，要对好的事心存感恩。

sentences.en: Is anything wrong? You haven’t said more than two words since you got here.
sentences.cn: 出什么事啦？你到这儿以后还没说超过两句话呢。

sentences.en: It looks like it's spelled wrong.
sentences.cn: 看起来像是拼错了。

sentences.en: It would be wrong to continue out of perversity.
sentences.cn: 为了故意作对而继续这样做是不对的。

sentences.en: Pain is the body's way of telling us that something is wrong.
sentences.cn: 疼痛是身体在告诉我们有地方出问题了。

sentences.en: Something must have gone wrong with the satellite link.
sentences.cn: 卫星连接一定出了毛病。

sentences.en: The right decision was made, but probably for the wrong reasons.
sentences.cn: 作出的决定是正确的，但理由可能是错误的。

sentences.en: The wrong shampoo can leave curly hair in a tangled mess.
sentences.cn: 不合适的洗发水会使卷发纠结成乱糟糟的一团。

sentences.en: They think that any legislation that involved putting down dogs was wrong.
sentences.cn: 他们认为任何涉及捕杀狗的立法都是错误的。

sentences.en: Very dark glossy lips look wrong with heavily made-up eyes.
sentences.cn: 涂有深色唇彩的嘴唇看上去和浓艳的眼妆不相称。

sentences.en: We got married when I was 30 for all the wrong reasons.
sentences.cn: 由于种种阴差阳错，我30岁时我们结了婚。

sentences.en: What? Have I done it wrong ?
sentences.cn: 什么？我做得不对吗？

sentences.en: When things go wrong, all of us naturally feel disappointed and frustrated.
sentences.cn: 出问题时，我们大家自然都感到失望和沮丧。

sentences.en: You’ve spelt my name wrong.
sentences.cn: 你把我的名字拼错了。

sentences.en: Your calculations must be wrong.
sentences.cn: 你肯定算错了。

words.tran_cn: 不正当的；不讲道理的；不合法的
错误地；不恰当地；不公正地
做坏事的人；违法犯罪者
错误地；邪恶的，不正当地

phrases.phrase: get (hold of) the wrong end of the stick

phrases.tran_cn: 方向（或顺序）不对（或不正）地

phrases.phrase: two wrongs don't make a right
phrases.tran_cn: (谚)以牙还牙行不通；两个错误不等于一个正确；不能因别人错了自己也就可以犯错

trans.tran_cn: 错误的，有问题/麻烦的，不合适的，出故障的，不道德的，不可取的
trans.tran_en: not correct, and not based on true facts

trans.tran_cn: 不义行为，邪恶，犯罪，罪恶
trans.tran_en: behaviour that is not morally right
used to describe a situation where there are problems, or when someone is ill or unhappy
